input.prompt:
You have a new project to scope: Adding PNG and PDF export to the recommendations page on the OST tool.

The CEO wants users to be able to export the recommendations view as PNG and PDF files.

The OST tool is at /Users/jeffsherlock/Projects/teamhq/ost-tool/ â€” it's a Vite+React frontend with an Express backend. The recommendations page shows opportunity solution tree recommendations.

Please:
1. Read the existing OST tool code to understand the recommendations page structure
2. Scope the requirements for PNG and PDF export
3. Write requirements to docs/ost-export-requirements.md
4. Create tasks with dependencies for the team
5. Recommend who should be involved next (typically Andrei for tech approach, then Robert for design, then Alice/Jonah for implementation)

Remember to read the agent definitions and existing docs to understand the project context. The working directory is /Users/jeffsherlock/Projects/teamhq/
